name: PDOK Datasets
description: The PDOK Datasets website is a public data catalog providing access to Dutch geospatial datasets and services.

data_themes.title: Geographic data
data_themes.description: Data with a geographic location, e.g., cadastral parcels, addresses, topographic maps.

data_themes.title: Transportation data
data_themes.description: Data related to transport infrastructure, e.g., roads, railways, waterways.

geotopics.title: Boundaries
geotopics.description: Legal administrative and statistical boundaries, cadastral boundaries.
